dt: {bc}a person who sells or grows for sale flowers and ornamental plants

et: earlier, "one expert at growing flowers, one knowledgeable about flowers," from Latin {it}flōr-, flōs{/it} {et_link|flower:1|flower:1} + {et_link|-ist:1|-ist:1}
shortdef: a person who sells or grows for sale flowers and ornamental plants
